parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.21

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the size of the given marker. A getter for [[setMarkerSize]] and an alias of [[markerSize]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getMarkerSize''' markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [a-axis, b-axis], where:
* a-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 width of marker
* b-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 height of marker
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" [[setMarkerSize]] [100,200];
_size = [[getMarkerSize]] "MarkerOne"; //returns [100,200]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerSize]], [[setMarkerBrush]], [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerDir]], [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerShape]], [[createMarker]], [[setMarkerText]], [[setMarkerType]], [[setMarkerAlpha]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
